text: 1.23: Mk 16.15; Ef 3.17; 1 T 3.16; Hi 3.14Nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi tɨva suirav, guigira havhargip thɨgɨri. Nde muuŋv kɨrim, bigɨn thueŋ nde ŋgɨrgɨrim, nde mba mbararagi buna vhuueŋ, nde nen rarga ki, nde ne tharga. Gu Por, gu mba buna vhuueŋ bun nzuai ŋaara guma kav, nza mba buna vhuueŋ bun za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ga suaŋgi.
